thread.title: Pence Holds Out Possibility of Meeting With North Korea at Olympics

author: Michael R. Gordon
title: Pence Holds Out Possibility of Meeting With North Korea at Olympics
text:
Vice President Mike Pence and Secretary of State Rex Tillerson are signaling that the Winter Olympics could be a venue for high-level contacts with North Korea, as Washington begins to explore whether its year-long pressure campaign could translate into meaningful diplomacy.
Mr. Pence said on Monday night that he wouldn’t rule out a meeting with North Korean officials when he attends the Olympic events in South Korea this week.

“President... RELATED VIDEO By opening the door to dialogue, Kim Jong Un has turned the world's biggest sporting event into a political weapon. WSJ looks at why the Winter Games are so important to Pyongyang.
